description: Page title for creating a new resource for the tipline bot to deliver
Page title for editing an existing resource for the tipline bot to deliver
Page description for adding a new tipline resource
defaultMessage: Add multimedia content as a response to a Tipline Menu option by adding a new resource.

description: Label for action button to save a tipline resource.
Label for action button to create a new tipline resource.
Error message displayed when a user submits a form with a URL that the server does not recognize.
Error message displayed when a user submits a form with a blank title.
Error message displayed when a user uploads a file of the wrong type. This is followed with a list of file types like 'png, jpg, jpeg, pdf'.
defaultMessage: File must be of the following allowed types: {fileTypes}

description: Error message displayed when it's not possible to save a resource.
defaultMessage: Could not save resource, please try again.

description: Success message displayed when a resource is saved.
Success message displayed when a resource is deleted.
Label for tipline resource title field
Title for the resource content section on a tipline resource settings page
Label for a field where the user inputs text for an introduction to a tipline resource that has an RSS feed
Label for a field where the user inputs text for the contents of a static tipline resource
Message on tipline resource settings page that explains how RSS feeds work there.
defaultMessage: Use an RSS feed to automatically load new content for your resource.

description: Label for a switch where the user turns on RSS (Really Simple Syndication) capability - should not be translated unless there is a local idiom for 'RSS'
Label for action button to delete a tipline resource.
Confirmation dialog message when deleting a tipline resource.
defaultMessage: This content won't be available for tipline users anymore. This action can't be undone.

description: Button label to confirm tipline resource deletion.
Confirmation dialog title when deleting a tipline resource.
defaultMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this resource?
